file_content.text: My master and I remain your humble servants, my lord.
My master was very impressed with your work in the Tion Hegemony. She looks forward to working with you again in the future.
Others may soon learn of the situation in the Tion Hegemony. You must act quickly.
A moment of your time, my lord. My master wishes to speak with you.
Word has come to my master that your services may be for hire. She has an offer she would like you to hear.
My master has followed your career with great interest. She has a proposition for you.
Few in the galaxy could stand against such a formidable collection of talent. That is why my master would like to make you an offer.
There are many ears about. Please wait while I establish a secure connection.
It is an honor to meet the famed Emperor's Wrath. I am Darth Nurin, a humble servant of you and your master.
I welcome those who are loyal to me... provided they have something of value to offer.
You are wise to bow before me.
Congratulations on your ascension to the Dark Council, my lord. I am Darth Nurin, your humble servant.
I suspect I will soon have a host of followers swearing undying loyalty. Most will be beneath my notice.
You are wise to bow before me.
I did not come empty-handed, my lord. I know of an opportunity. One you alone have the strength to seize.
I am Darth Nurin. I must congratulate you on eliminating the Supreme Chancellor. You struck quite a blow against the Republic.
I am Darth Nurin. I must thank you for eliminating Darth Tormen. You removed a dangerous rival from my path.
That job is over and done with. Now I'm looking for the next one.
I don't dwell on my past.
I suspected as much. I have a job for you. I promise I will make it worth your while.
My name is Darth Nurin. Please accept my condolences on the unfortunate end of the Imperial Intelligence program.
A lot of Sith were happy to see us go. You might be one of them.
I can't tell if you're joking.
On the contrary. I understand the value of what you did. In fact, I have need of your services again.
I am Darth Nurin. I have been following your career with great interest.
My name is Darth Nurin. I have been following your careers with great interest.
Everywhere I go, people seem to know my name. And ask me for favors.
You and everyone else.
That is the price of fame. Everyone wants something from you. But I come with an offer. An opportunity waiting to be seized.
There must be a reason you sent your minion to find me.
Why did you contact me?
I have learned of an opportunity. One that can be claimed only through strength, skill and cunning.
Spare me your bootlicking.
Of course. Forgive me, my lord.
Few are permitted to talk to me that way. But I will forgive your insolence, since I have need of your unique skills.
Are you familiar with the Tion Hegemony? An independent sector, they claim to be neutral in the war between the Empire and Republic.
Wealthy, powerful and stubborn, the Tion Hegemony has the potential to be the Empire's greatest threat now that the Republic has fallen low.
We have the upper hand, but the war against the Republic is far from over.
The Republic may rise again.
Which is exactly why we need to secure control of the Tion Hegemony. Before, they rebuffed our overtures. Now things have changed.
The war with the Republic has left the Empire vulnerable. Do you think they'll try to take advantage of the situation?
You expect them to attack us?
In the past, the Tion Hegemony has been aggressive about expanding its sphere of influence. But things have changed.
They won't be expecting an attack so soon after our battles with the Republic. We'll catch them unaware.
We should strike now!
Open warfare could cause the Tion Hegemony to unite with the Republic. But there is another way.
We intercepted a series of classified transmissions. The Tion Hegemony's in trouble. Their worlds are being overrun by rakghouls!
Unchecked, the outbreak will infect billions. Entire planets will be overrun. But with chaos comes opportunity for those with the power to seize it.
You're afraid of the rakghouls, aren't you?
And you're too scared to go.
As a group, you have power far greater than my own.
Your power is far greater than mine, my lord.
Why should I put myself in harm's way, when I can send others to do the job?
The rakghouls were confined to Taris for centuries. They didn't get off that world by accident.
How did this happen?
We suspect this may be one of the Tion royal families making a bid for power. But we have no way to know for sure.
There's too much we don't know about this. I want to go there right away.
I better investigate.
The Tion Hegemony is trying to suppress this news. It has been difficult to gather the necessary details.
Meet me on my ship. Hopefully by then, we'll know more. My apprentice can provide the location.
Here are the coordinates of my master's vessel. She eagerly looks forward to your arrival.
The Republic's days are numbered. Soon the Empire will crush our ancient foe.
